snippet: Two astronauts spent five and a half hours outside the International Space Station. They were unable to locate the source of the leak, but did install a new pump, which appeared to solve the problem.
abstract: Two astronauts aboard International Space Station conduct unplanned spacewalk to look for source of leak that forced shutdown of one of eight power systems providing electricity to orbiting laboratory; astronauts spend five and a half hours outside space station, but are unable to locate source of leak; installation of new pump appears to solve problem.
lead_paragraph: Two astronauts spent five and a half hours outside the International Space Station. They were unable to locate the source of the leak, but did install a new pump, which appeared to solve the problem.

headline.seo: Astronauts Replace a Pump, Hoping to Stop Leak
headline.main: Astronauts Take Unplanned Spacewalk to Repair Leak
headline.print_headline: Astronauts Take Unplanned Spacewalk to Repair Leak
